channel.title: 508+ Client And Server Error (Need Help) [Vista]
channel.description:
Ok ive been coding for years and this is the only error ive came across that i cant sort out mainly because ive moved from 2 years of windows xp experience to windows vista and ive had my new computer for 2 days now and im really pissed.
Note To Noobs: My name says "(need help)" not "(need flamers)".
So before you post comments saying stuff like "your a fucking douche bag, learn to code!" well for your info i can code and prehaps better than you...
Server Error:
[img]http://img215.imageshack.us/i/servererror.jpg/[/img]
Client Error:
[img]http://img215.imageshack.us/i/clienterror.jpg/[/img]
Caches:
[img]http://img687.imageshack.us/i/cachesl.jpg/[/img]
I just wan't to praise a few people who helped me get where i am today in coding terms.
Paladino76 ( starting point of 508's )
Davidi2 ( hes just amazing... his server davidscape was the first source i used and my server is down for updates but it has been running on a 8gb vps and has over 700 players ) Note To Davidi2: I'm now of from hamachi :L, Memories, Memories, Memories...
Clockwise26 ( making the server tokkulscape, probally best source for new coders. )
Thats all of the people you should worship because they own ;) .
[size=24pt]RuneBoy66 Proud To Be A Member Of Moparscape![/size]

item.title: 508+ Client And Server Error (Need Help) [Vista]
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

yu will get used to vista it was hard for me at 1st but i got rlly good at it. it is best to start out from scratch with vista. i started coding on vista and now it is simple for me.

Read full topic

item.title: 508+ Client And Server Error (Need Help) [Vista]
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

ummm you mind posting better pics bro? might be able to help if we see errors.

Hope to see pics soon

Read full topic

item.title: 508+ Client And Server Error (Need Help) [Vista]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“runeboy66, post:6, topic:338318”]David basically my pics havent worked lol. ( i fail at bb code or what ever it is…) well if you can help that would be great and basically when i run a client like your one it comes up saying ““java” is not recognised as a internal or external command!
please try again…” or something…[/quote]That means you need to set you environmental variables, or show me your run.bat and I can change it for you.

Read full topic

please try again…” or something…

item.title: 508+ Client And Server Error (Need Help) [Vista]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’d be glad to help, but here at school, it blocks images from the internet (stupid, eh?). Can you either post some more information about your problem, or I will just wait until I get home to help
